title: 83. The $ and Legal Side of Esthetics (with Attorney Danielle Stead.)
description:
In this episode, I chat with Danielle Stead Blanton, business coach and attorney.

We discuss how to prepare your business for financial and legal success including topics such as:

- LLCs

- Credit Cards and what NOT to do with them

- Banking

- Staying within your scope for your own good

- Danielle's pivots from corporate to owning her own successful business, and finding happiness doing her own thing!

Contact Danielle + Learn More.

Follow Danielle on Instagram. 

MY SOCIAL MEDIA + SHOPS

For more details on my products, visit www.freeskinbytessa.com, or follow along on instagram @freeskinbytessa.
